sentences.en: But while there are certainly aboveboard agents and applications, other recruiters engage in fraudulent behavior.
sentences.cn: 但有一些光明正大的代理机构和申请的同时，另一些招生者从事欺诈行为。

sentences.en: He is dignified, and open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他堂堂正正, 光明正大.

sentences.en: He is trustworthy. He is regarded as honest and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他是可信赖的. 他被公认为诚实而光明正大的人.

sentences.en: He was frank, open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他胸怀坦白, 光明磊落.
他的生意来往是光明正大的.

sentences.en: His part in the affair was quite aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 在这事情上,他的行为是非常光明磊落的.

sentences.en: His part in the affair was quite open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他参与这件事完全是正大光明的.

sentences.en: I think everything ought to be aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 我觉得什么事情都应当开诚布公.

sentences.en: If not, and one of them causes the other suffering that too is natural and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 合不来时,给别人点苦头吃, 也是正大光明的事.

sentences.en: If there was one thing she prided herself on, it was being open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 如果她对自己有一事而自豪，那就是她的公开及光明正大。

sentences.en: It guarantees a fair and aboveboard election by letting every voter express his or her will freely without subject to coercion, surveillance or threat by anyone.
sentences.cn: 它通过让每位选民自由表达自己的选举意志，并且没有任何人可以对选民进行胁迫、监视以及威胁，来保证选举是公平、光明正大的。

sentences.en: Perfect gentleman aboveboard reflect the sentiments meditations Huaiyuan ambitions!
sentences.cn: 完美地体现出君子坦荡荡的情怀,静思怀远的志向!

sentences.en: The Electoral Commission has ruled that the procedure was aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 选举委员会裁定选举程序很光明磊落.

sentences.en: Their actions are open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他们的行为都是公开及光明磊落.

sentences.en: Their business was open and aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 他们的交易是公开的,光明正大的.
这些交易是光明磊落的.

sentences.en: We are aboveboard no matter what things we do, never keep It'secret.
sentences.cn: 做任何事,我们都是光明正大的, 从不偷偷摸摸.

sentences.en: We should be aboveboard in all of our dealings.
sentences.cn: 我们做各种事情都应该光明正大.

sentences.en: You can rebuild trust, but only if your husband behaves in a manner that is completely aboveboard.
sentences.cn: 只要你的丈夫的行为方式完全光明正大，你们完全可以重新建立信任。

words.tran_cn: 直率的,不模棱两可的,毫不含糊的

trans.tran_en: An arrangement or deal that is aboveboard is legal and is being carried out openly and honestly. A person who is aboveboard is open and honest about what they are doing.
An arrangement or deal that is aboveboard is legal and is being carried out openly and honestly. A person who is aboveboard is open and honest about what they are doing.
